meta.keywords: gas, stomach pain, indigestion, nausea, ayurvedic
meta.description: No Gas syrup is an ayurvedic medicine that provides relief from acidity as well as gas problems.

pageTitle: Ayurvedic Medicine for Indigestion | No Gas syrup

productDescription.line1: No Gas syrup is an ayurvedic medicine that provides relief from acidity as well as gas problems.
productDescription.line2: We have enriched this syrup with special healing medicinal plants & ingredients like Trikatu, Cuminum Cyminum that gets you rid of the burning sensation in stomach and indigestion. You can now say goodbye to all your stomach related disorders.

indication.title: Indication
listOfIndications: Nausea and vomiting due to indigestion and gastric disorders

ingredient.title: Ingredients
ingredient.information: Each teaspoonful (10ml) of No Gas syrup contains extract derived from:

dosage.title: Dosage
availableDosages: Children: 1 teaspoon 3-4 times a day before meal
Adults: 2 teaspoon 3-4 times a day before meal
